events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and the resume looks promising.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering team for further evaluation.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidateâ€™s progress throughout the hiring process for the developer role.
The candidate has completed the initial screening call, displaying good knowledge of software engineering fundamentals.
The candidate responded positively to the next steps and is available for a technical interview on the proposed dates.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with our senior engineering team next week.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving ability.
An HR interview has been scheduled following the positive technical assessment to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
The candidate completed the HR interview and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
A competitive offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary, stock options, and other benefits.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about the opportunity.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer and is preparing to start with us next month.
The onboarding process has been initiated for the new software engineer, including system access and orientation schedule.
The hiring process is now officially closed with the successful addition of a new engineer to the team.
